title: Android Ana Maico 2010
overview: It is the year 2010, and a plethora of radio stations are competing for the attention of the millions of prospective listeners that tune in daily. A new breakthrough in radio technology, namely an android announcer, Maico, capable of delivering non-stop excitement to listeners (androids require no bathroom breaks, sleep, or food â€” just plug them in and they are set to go) seems to be the last hope for a failing radio station.But what happens when you give the project to six failed employees that have not yet delivered a single really successful program in all their careers? And all of them have their own ideas on how to create and manage such a show? Wait and see...
